vote.text: Amendment SA 1114 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1114 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Heinrich to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6314) To improve the bill.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1114 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
